adrFormatAddress: 242 Broome St, Manhattan, NY 10002, USA

originalText.text: Bond Vet on the LES NY has the best doctors and team!  They have taken care of our little everything ‘Bagel’ and treat him like he’s the most special boy.  Bagel likes to stop by on his way to the park for some kisses and treats.  We were very lucky to have them help raise our first child.

Bagel likes to stop by on his way to the park for some kisses and treats.  We were very lucky to have them help raise our first child.

originalText.text:
Great people great care... my Roxy had a terrible skin condition which was treated at
Bond vet. She's on the mend. Very attentive staff and vets. I found my forever vet. Plus Roxy loves the snacks.

originalText.text: l went to many vets clinics, and Bond Vet was amazing experience my dogs even knows how to walk there to get there. The doctors are amazing and I am very grateful and trust them with my dog she does to Thank you Bond Vet . For giving my dog the best care thank you. Sincerely, Doris

text.text: l went to many vets clinics, and Bond Vet was amazing experience my dogs even knows how to walk there to get there. The doctors are amazing and I am very grateful and trust them with my dog she does to Thank you Bond Vet . For giving my dog the best care thank you. Sincerely, Doris

originalText.text:
Today 9/17/22 my baby Missy had her first appointment for a wellness check and vaccines. I was on a tight budget, so the fact that for new clients the first exam is only $25 is Awesome. She also explained the cost of any future visit, which is $125 after the first visit. All of the staff are very welcoming and helpful. When I walked in I was greeted by beautiful decor and a very sweet gentleman who attended to us as soon as we walked in. It took about five minutes for the vet assistant to come out and get us which is great timing. We went into this nice room and she complimented my little Missy with genuineness. She did the basic stuff asked the basic questions as is to be expected. She listened thoroughly to all of my questions and comments. She also gave Missy a treat before the doctor came in. Dr. Tong is super nice and gentle, he physically examined Missy and took his time. Whenever she was squirming the assistant and he would pet her to try to calm her. He answered every question I had as well as offered me information I needed to know. All around he is a pleasant Dr. After us all speaking they took Missy to another room for  her shots and he also gave me a complimentary nail trimming which was a super great surprise. When they finished a nurse brought her out to me and gave me her paperwork and things to look out for since she had her shots. I really love this place because of the people. You can just really tell they really care about animals. I also got a free tote bag, hat, scarf and tennis ball.
Super important, Missy's carrier was to small and I was going to be late. I called them up and explained the situation and how I had to go buy one, she was very understanding. She informed me there is a same day reschedule fee but she would wave it for me because of my situation and would also inform the doctor as well.

originalText.text: We had a great experience here. We were able to be seen immediately and they treated our furbaby with loving care. They made sure we felt comfortable as well and that we weren’t stressed about the situation. We will recommend this place time and time again.
